# Feature Request: [Title]

## Feature Summary
> *Example: Add Dark Mode support for the dashboard.*

---

## Branch Name
> **feature/dark-mode**

## Why is this needed? (Problem Statement)
> *Example: Users complain about eye strain when using the app at night.*

---

## Proposed Solution (The "What")
**How should it work?**
> *Example: A toggle switch in the settings to change the UI theme.*

---

##  Class / Module Impact
* **New Class(es):** > *e.g., ThemeManager* (كلاسات جديدة)

* **Modified Class(es):** > *e.g., BaseViewController* (كلاسات سيتم تعديلها)

---

##  User Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] User can toggle Dark/Light mode.
- [ ] Theme preference is saved for the next login.
- [ ] All dashboard components update their colors correctly.
